pullRequest.title: fix: Fix css-loader to not handle urls
pullRequest.bodyText:
Css loader should not try to translate urls
as we shouldn't have at the moment any
internal urls that would need handling.
Fixes #9554

commit.message:
fix: Fix css-loader to not handle urls

Css loader should not try to translate urls
as we shouldn't have at the moment any
internal urls that would need handling.

Fixes #9554

loader formatting fix.

Co-authored-by: Kari Söderholm <haprog@vaadin.com>
